# navigationController(_:willShow:animated:)

**Instance Method**

Notifies the delegate before the navigation controller displays a view controller’s view and navigation item properties.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func navigationController(_ navigationController: UINavigationController, willShow viewController: UIViewController, animated: Bool)
```

## Parameters

- **navigationController**: The navigation controller that is showing the view and properties of a view controller.
- **viewController**: The view controller whose view and navigation item properties are being shown.
- **animated**: [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to animate the transition; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Responding to a view controller being shown

- **navigationController(_:didShow:animated:)**: Notifies the delegate after the navigation controller displays a view controller’s view and navigation item properties.
